statements: UPDATE transactions SET amount = 100, date = '2022-01-10' WHERE transaction_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET date = '2022-01-15', amount = 150 WHERE user_id = '78901234-5678-9012-3456-789012345678';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000 WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET date = '2022-01-01 10:00:00' WHERE transaction_id = '98765432-1234-5678-9876-543212345678';
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 100.50 WHERE transaction_id = 123;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_status = 'Approved', transaction_description = 'Payment Received' WHERE history_id = 456;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 5000.00, transaction_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE transaction_id = 100;
UPDATE transaction_history SET transaction_description = 'Updated transaction status', transaction_status = 'COMPLETE' WHERE transaction_id = 200;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 500.00, transaction_date = '2022-01-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-01-20', transaction_amount = 750.00 WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_amount = 1000.00, transaction_date = '2022-03-15' WHERE transaction_id = 1;
UPDATE transactions SET transaction_date = '2022-03-20', transaction_amount = 1500.50 WHERE transaction_id = 2;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, transaction_type = 'credit' WHERE transaction_id = 12345;
UPDATE products SET price = 49.99, stock_quantity = stock_quantity - 1 WHERE product_id = 789;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1500.00, transaction_type = 'Purchase' WHERE transaction_id = 1002;
UPDATE customers SET email = 'newemail@example.com', first_name = 'John' WHERE customer_id = 5001;
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 150.75, description = 'Grocery Shopping' WHERE id = 1234;
UPDATE accounts SET balance = balance - 50.25 WHERE account_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE transactions SET amount = 1000.50, description = 'Payment received' WHERE id = 1234;
UPDATE users SET email = 'newemail@example.com', username = 'newusername' WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
